bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names du jing yin chuang 妒精陰瘡 , jealousy spirit sores in the body’s yin region. Pathological Condition of yin shi 陰蝕 , erosion in the genital region, developing at the glans penis of men and in the genital tract of women. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 24: 妒精瘡者，男子在陰頭節 下，婦人在玉門內，並似甘瘡作臼 , “As for ‘ jealousy spirit sores ’, males have them below the glans penis section, females have them inside the jade gate. In all cases they resemble ‘ gan [-illness] sores’ forming an indentation”.
